constituent: slacken, thread, spiderman, migrating ducks, claw, vulture, one, friend
koohiiStory1: [slacken; loosen; relax; lessen; be moderate; ease] The thread in this story is a cable line, something like a power or phone line. The thread was tense with all the migrating ducks perched on it, but got back to being slackened when the entire flock flew away. (darg_sama-modified,2-11-2005).
koohiiStory2: Spiderman is a slacken off. He lays around all day in the park watching migrating ducks...　RTK2:　カン　緩和　かんわ(mitigation).
kunYomi: ゆる.い、ゆる.やか、ゆる.む、ゆる.める
readingExamples: 緩い (ゆる.い), 緩む (ゆる.む), 緩める (ゆる.める), 緩やか (ゆる.やか)
